name: SparcqlRunner
description: APSRQL query runner to find givenNames related info frpom wikidata.

scripts.crawl: ts-node crawler.ts --seeds seeds.txt --out out.csv --depth 2 --concurrency 3 --rate-limit-ms 500 --max-pages 500 --same-domain-only true --respect-robots true --respect-nofollow true --pause-on-captcha true
scripts.crawl:unrestricted: ts-node crawler.ts --seeds seeds.txt --out out_unrestricted.csv --depth 3 --concurrency 5 --rate-limit-ms 0 --max-pages 0 --same-domain-only false --respect-robots false --respect-nofollow false --pause-on-captcha false
